item.title: Goldman Sachs and BNY join forces to transform $7.1 trillion money market industry with digital tokens
item.description: Clients of BNY will be able to invest in money market funds whose ownership will be recorded on Goldman's blockchain platform.

item.title: GoPro, Krispy Kreme join the meme party as Wall Street speculation ramps up
item.description: Reddit-obsessed retail traders targeted wearable camera firm GoPro and donut maker Krispy Kreme on Wednesday.

item.title: Meme screen: Heavily shorted small stocks that are starting to rip this week
item.description: CNBC ran a screen of U.S. stocks to find the next meme names with characteristics such as elevated levels of short interest and low stock price.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Hasbro, Texas Instruments, Hilton, AT&T and more
item.description: Check out the companies making headlines before the opening bell.

item.title: From robotaxis to rockets: Morningstar rated these two ETFs as top performers. How they're positioning right now
item.description: He helped clinch the top two spots on Morningstar's best performing ETFs last quarter, and now Ark Invest's Brett Winton is looking to do it again.
